name: real cars racing 2017 traffic city car games 17 3D
name_original: real cars racing 2017 traffic city car games 17 3D
description:
For a limited period! Get the new speed cars racing 2016 with no ads for just 1.99$ with all the amazing cars unlocked!

Speed cars racing 2016 is a cars game that will entertain you every time you play it.

Do you love playing speed racing game? Do you love driving cars in speed ? If you love speed and playing racing cars game, you will surely enjoy playing Speed Cars Racing 2016 on your device. It is a simple cars speed racing game with no difficulty but it is unique in its dynamics, play plan, tweak, and twists !
How to play the game !
It is simple to play but it is challenging to master the car control and cars speed up on screen. Therefore you as a racer, have to play with best alertness on.
• You need to increase the speed of your car in order to overtake all other cars,
• You will enjoy the advantage of increasing your game score by utilizing the cars boost power ups popping up on your screen:
• You need to complete a car racing session in two modes: either within pre-set number of laps or within a pre-set time frame
• You ultimate aim is to overlap all other rival cars race in order to get the first place by racing and speeding the car you are driving.
It is a cars racing game app and will get quickly synchronized on your device post you hit the download button. Before you hit the play button, take a cool look at the game features :
• The Speed cars racing 2016is a race and arcade categorized game and it has a brilliant user interface: it has play button to start playing and help button to learn the game plan of the app,
• Colorful graphics and lively animation are the two USPs of the 3D racing game: car designs are cool and nice,
• The game has multiple levels: once you secure first place in a level, you will be auto promoted to the next racing level,
• There is stimulating music at the background: you can off/on it according to your personal choice: you can adjust brightness of the screen as well.
• If you fail to complete the race within fixed time or fixed laps, you have to start from first again: it is hardcore challenging,
• Some car needs to get unlocked: after reaching a level only you can unlock them. This applicable for laps also.
• The game can be paused at any point you like, and you can start playing the car racing game where you paused the game before.
Download the speed racing game and start enjoying unlimited with kids and friends! You will never get bored with Speed Cars Racing 2016!
